description: The Buffalo Balls Cocktail is a delightful drink that's perfect for anyone who enjoys&nbsp;bourbon and&nbsp;cinnamon whiskey. This unique cocktail uses&nbsp;Buffalo Trace bourbon with Fireball that imparts a sweet and smoky flavor to the drink.The addition of the Fireball whiskey gives the cocktail a touch of sweetness and a hint of spice. When served over ice, the Buffalo Balls Cocktail is guaranteed to satisfy any&nbsp;bourbon lover.
